name: imdb_title_id
description: a tconst, an alphanumeric unique identifier of the title

name: original_title
description: The original title of the movie (in case it was changed in other languages).

name: year
description: The year when the movie was released.

name: date_published
description: The date when the movie was released. (Can be either a year YYYY or date YYYY-mm-dd)

name: genre
description: The genre or general type that defines this particular movie (e.g. drama, comedy etc).

name: duration
description: The length of time a movie typically runs for (in minutes).

name: country
description: The country where this film was produced and distributed from by its makers/producers/distributors etc.

name: director
description: Name(s) who held such position within a company operating such work within service activities related to motion pictures production / Marketing / Distributing organization related to motion pictures &videos media goods or services activities.

name: writer
description: Name(s) involved directly with providing scripts/writing work concerning production services relative to entertainment markets.

name: production_company
description: Name(s)of companies that operated through provision-enabling goods and services viewing an image capturing process which may result with presentation output form; pre-recorded physical presentation medium ,digital encoded representation platforms whereby end user are provided remote access video streams viewed as “movies” entertainment content; i..e, Netflix., Hulu., iTunes.,Amazon prime networks outlets.

name: actors
description: Names present cast memebers actively performing as main characters engaging events as conveyed through storytelling based on account narration prior agreed upon written narrative layout outlines by licensed contracted writers crafting products order fulfillment purposes representing interests vested producers willing participant level exchanges business interacting engaged contracting parties exchanged oblations rights reserved .accordance.

name: description
description: A short text summary about what happens typically during plot points encapsulated succinct layman terminology expressed briefly offering cursory glance script context related genres historically attributed classification identification webpages print literature sources citation references.

name: avg_vote
description: The average vote score for the movie.

name: votes
description: The total number of votes for the movie.
